markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Xulgath Leader](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3246)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Xulgath leaders are usually the strongest, most violent members of a community—although in some cases, particularly in larger groups, xulgath clutches are led by powerful demon cultists or other monsters who seek to use the xulgaths as servants or sacrifices.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Xulgath Leader](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3246)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
<trait label="Xulgath" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=781" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 353 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +9; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**
[Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Sakvroth](/Languages.aspx?ID=118)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +11, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +1

**Con** +2

**Int** -1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10), [Greataxe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=21), [Javelin](/Weapons.aspx?ID=71) (4)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +6 

**Will** +9 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 44

</row>

**[Stench](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=76)** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=542), [olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=664)) 30 feet, DC 19

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
greataxe +11 ([Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d10+6 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +11,
**Damage** 1d6+6 piercing plus weakening strike

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d4+6 slashing plus weakening strike

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
javelin +8 ([thrown 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing

**Weakening Strike**   A creature hit by a xulgath leader's jaws or claw Strike is [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=71) (or enfeebled 2 on a critical hit) for 1 round.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-486" />
name: Xulgath Leader
